name: Robert Byrnes
coverLetter: Currently I have a "harvest support" contracting gig with a company based out of Portland that specializes in wet/dry trimming, big leafing, bucking, harvesting, cleaning and other various tasks with the ability to adapt to various strains, styles, and types of indoor or outdoor cannabis. In the past I have also held roles such as watering, feeding, transplanting, grooming and building structures for the plants. As the harvest season comes to an end so does most of the support work...therefore I am currently seeking other companies who still need help. I am available all days and have my own transportation.
